mapper.sql: id, user_id, nick_name, phone, sax, tallest_diploma, graduate_institutions, specialized, teaching_school, teaching_age, teaching_subject_id, teaching_grade_id, teaching_address, teaching_mode, teaching_time, remuneration, teaching_feature, lon, lat, need_type, teacher_photo, create_time, update_time,province_id,city_id,district_id
mapper.select: select a.id,a.nick_name as nickName ,b.grade_name as gradeName,c.subject_name as subjectName , a.teaching_grade_id as teachingGradeId,a.graduate_institutions as graduateInstitutions from need_info a LEFT JOIN grade_info b on a.teaching_grade_id = b.id LEFT JOIN subject_info c on c.id = a.teaching_subject_id where a.user_id = #{userId}

select a.id as id ,b.organization_id as organizationId,a.teaching_age teachingAge,a.nick_name as nickName, a.user_id as userId ,a.phone as phone,a.sax as sax, a.tallest_diploma as tallestDiploma, a.graduate_institutions as graduateInstitutions,a.specialized as specialized ,a.teaching_school as teachingSchool, a.teaching_age as teachingAge,a.teaching_address as teachingAddress,a.teaching_mode as teachingMode, a.teaching_time as teachingTime,a.teaching_feature as remuneration,a.remuneration as remuneration, a.lat as lat ,a.lon as lon,a.need_type as needType,a.teacher_photo as teacherPhoto b.user_type as userType,b.teacher_type as teacherType, d.grade_name as gradeName,e.subject_name as subjectName,b.certificationStatus as certificationStatus , (POWER(MOD(ABS(a.lon - #{longitude}),360),2) + POWER(ABS(a.lat - #{latitude}),2)) AS distance from need_info a LEFT JOIN user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user c on b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN grade_info d on d.id = a.teaching_grade_id LEFT JOIN subject_info e on e.id = a.teaching_subject_id where a.id = #{id}
